TABLE.NAME: question_coderunner_options
TABLE.COMMENT: Extension of the coderunner question table

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Every home should have one

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The question this option applies to

FIELD.NAME: coderunnertype
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the prototype question from which this question inherits. It should be a valid question name within the current question category or one of its ancestors.

FIELD.NAME: prototypetype
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 => not a prototype, 1 => built-in prototype, 2 => user_defined prototype

FIELD.NAME: allornothing
FIELD.COMMENT: True if answer must pass all test cases to earn any marks

FIELD.NAME: showsource
FIELD.COMMENT: True to display full source code after template expansion, for debugging template.

FIELD.NAME: precheck
FIELD.COMMENT: Sets what test-set is used if pre-checking is available. 0 = 'disable': no pretest button available; 1 = 'empty' for no actual tests; 2 = 'examples' for all use-as-example tests; 3 = 'selected' for specific selected tests, 4 = 'all' for all tests.

FIELD.NAME: answerboxlines
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of lines for the answer box

FIELD.NAME: answerboxcolumns
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of columns of answerbox. DEFUNCT.

FIELD.NAME: answerpreload
FIELD.COMMENT: Text to be preloaded into the question answer box.

FIELD.NAME: globalextra
FIELD.COMMENT: Extra field for use by template editors, global to all tests.

FIELD.NAME: useace
FIELD.COMMENT: True to use the Ace code editor for the template code.

FIELD.NAME: penaltyregime
FIELD.COMMENT: A comma-separated list of percentage penalties to apply to each submission. If empty use default question penalty

FIELD.NAME: answer
FIELD.COMMENT: A solution to the problem. Should satisfy all the test cases (and may be used to generate solutions to them).

FIELD.NAME: validateonsave
FIELD.COMMENT: If true, the sample answer will be checked when saving and saving will be aborted if the tests don't pass

FIELD.NAME: enablecombinator
FIELD.COMMENT: True if the combinator template may be used. True for most built-in questions (i.e. the prototypes) and false for most other customised questions.

FIELD.NAME: resultcolumns
FIELD.COMMENT: A JSON record defining which result fields to display in the results table and what column name to use.

FIELD.NAME: template
FIELD.COMMENT: The template for this question, expanded by Twig to yield the program to be executed.

FIELD.NAME: iscombinatortemplate
FIELD.COMMENT: True iff the template is a combinator template, i.e. takes a list of test cases rather than a single one.

FIELD.NAME: combinatortemplate
FIELD.COMMENT: DEFUNCT: An optional template to be used to combine all tests into a single run

FIELD.NAME: allowmultiplestdins
FIELD.COMMENT: Normally, if tests each have their own stdin, the combinator is run once for each testcase (as it's then difficult to combine all tests into a single program). Setting this field to true results in the combinator being called once with all test cases present, as happens when there is no stdin.

FIELD.NAME: testsplitterre
FIELD.COMMENT: The regular expression argument to preg_split to split output from the combinator run into the basic tests again. Meaningful only if combinator template provided

FIELD.NAME: pertesttemplate
FIELD.COMMENT: DEFUNCT: A template to build a test run for each test case. Required.

FIELD.NAME: templateparams
FIELD.COMMENT: A json-encoded record of extra parameters to pass to the template engine when building the source code to be executed.

FIELD.NAME: hoisttemplateparams
FIELD.COMMENT: True to hoist templateparams into Twig global namespace.

FIELD.NAME: twigall
FIELD.COMMENT: True to apply Twig macro expansion to question text and testcases.

FIELD.NAME: language
FIELD.COMMENT: The programming language, to be passed to the sandbox

FIELD.NAME: acelang
FIELD.COMMENT: The language to configure the ace editor (if used). Required only if that language is different from the template language, which is what's used by default.

FIELD.NAME: sandbox
FIELD.COMMENT: The PHP class name of a specific sandbox to use. If null, a default one for the language is used.

FIELD.NAME: sandboxparams
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON-encoded extra parameters to sandbox.

FIELD.NAME: grader
FIELD.COMMENT: The PHP class name of the grader to use to grade results from the sandbox. If null, the BasicGrader class is used.

FIELD.NAME: cputimelimitsecs
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum CPU time allowed for execution (secs)

FIELD.NAME: memlimitmb
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum memory allowed for this task execution (MB)

FIELD.NAME: uiplugin
FIELD.COMMENT: The javascript UI plugin for student answer

FIELD.NAME: attachments
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether, and how many, attachments a student is allowed to include with their response. -1 means unlimited.

FIELD.NAME: attachmentsrequired
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of attachments that should be required

FIELD.NAME: maxfilesize
FIELD.COMMENT: Max allowable student file upload size in bytes

FIELD.NAME: filenamesregex
FIELD.COMMENT: What attachment file type a student is allowed to include with their response. * or empty means unlimited.

FIELD.NAME: filenamesexplain
FIELD.COMMENT: Explain what file names are allowed

FIELD.NAME: displayfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 to allow display of specific feedback to be controlled by quiz, 1 to force display, 2 to force hide

FIELD.NAME: tests
FIELD.COMMENT: The test cases, as a JSON string
